Context:
EllisDon made a $250,000 donation to George Brown College for capital costs at the Centre for Health Sciences Waterfront Building. The building was managed by EllisDon and opened to students last fall. Nona Heaslip and her late husband William made a $100,000 pledge to the campaign and were recognized by naming the 7th floor lecture hall.
